title: ManageEngine Recovery Manager Plus getEscapedValue Command Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of ManageEngine Recovery Manager Plus. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the getEscapedValue method. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of a user-supplied string before using it to execute a system call. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the service account.
addtionnal_details: ManageEngine has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.manageengine.com/ad-recovery-manager/advisory/CVE-2023-48646.html
timeline:
2023-06-22 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2023-11-22 - Coordinated public release of advisory
